docs.text: A clearing operation is when you charge money from a credit card. POST /api/pay { "sale_price": "2500", "currency": "ILS", "product_name": "Pizza" } sale_price - The price in cents currency - The currency - ILS, USD, EUR etc, etc, product_name - The name of the product. If everything went OK you'll get a 200 status code and the response: { "message": "The clearing process went OK" } If not, you'll get something 400 status code and en error like: { "message": "Something went wrong during the clearing. Please check logs" }
